comcmput301f16t01.github.carrier.Users

Class LoginMemory

  • java.lang.Object
    • comcmput301f16t01.github.carrier.Users.LoginMemory

  • public class LoginMemory
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a save file to tie a user's phone to their account after creating or logging in on the phone.
